title: The Vision
description: Don't close your eyes...He's watching you. He knows what you're doing. He knows what you're thinking. He's coming after you.Don't close your eyes...He has a knife. The steel blade gleams. Whenever you close your eyes, you can see it - the tip of his knife, pointing at your chest.Don't close your eyes...He's closing them for you.
author: Dean Koontz
